title: Himi 230
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e kakai kuo liliu,
‘I he Laumālie;
Ke tau hiva fakataha,
Pea fakafeta’i.
2.
Tau hiva, pea kalanga,
‘I he fiefia;
Pea fakaongo atu,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Ke tau fai ‘a e pole’o
Tau le’o, mo Sīsū,
Pea tau tokanga hake,
Ki he maama lelei.
4.
Pea tali teuteu atu,
Hotau laumālie;
Ki he maama ‘i ‘olunga
‘Oku ‘aho ma’u pē. *
